name: RABDONUT
description:
--RABDONUT

※This game was made to learn Unity.
There may be unexpected bugs... Please understand.
Machine translating Japanese, so the sentences may be wrong.

The specifications may differ slightly between 
the browser version and the win version.
---

◇Rules.
Turn a block into a colored donut and erase it.
Blocks are colored when you step on them.
You can push the block with X.
Use Z to erase a block. (up to three times).
It is not afraid of hitting falling blocks.
If you pile up five blocks, the game is over.
Try to erase 50 donuts.

◆controls
Move: Direction keys
Clear block: Z (up to 3 times)
Push blocks: X + directional key

◆Specifications and advice
Blocks cannot be climbed more than two steps.
The theory is to step on the blocks while stacking them flat.

You can push a block by moving while holding down the X key.
You can drop it on a step, but you cannot lift it.

You can erase blocks in Z key.
(Note that the direction of the character does not always correspond to the direction of movement due to specifications.)
It can be used up to three times.
You can recover one doughnut for every doughnut you erase.
Use it when when you can't move, or when blocks seem to be piled up too high.

The slow rotation of the camera is a specification.

If you are unlucky, the blocks will pile up unevenly.
If you follow the theory and do your best, you can get by.
